original_text: This is the law for a case of leprous disease in a garment of wool or linen, either in the warp or the woof, or in any article made of skin, to determine whether it is clean or unclean.
korean_text: 이는 털옷에나 베옷에나 그 날에나 씨에나 가죽으로 만든 모든 것에 발생한 나병 색점의 정하고 부정한 것을 진단하는 규례니라

sentences.original_text: for a case of leprous disease
in a garment of wool or linen
either in the warp or the woof
or in any article made of skin
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 가죽으로 만든 어떤 물건에 있는

sentences.original_text: to determine whether it is clean or unclean
